input: A majestic lion on the savanna under bright noon sun, golden grass swaying, feeling of strength and splendor.

In the background, distant acacia trees punctuate the horizon, contributing to the iconic African landscape. The image evokes a profound sense of strength and splendor, embodying the regal spirit of the king of the jungle.
